import React from 'react'; import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component'; import './item-overview.styles.scss'; const ItemOverview = () => { return (

Super Cute Chicken Nugget Charm/Keychain

Realistically sized adorable chicken nugget charm! No chicken was harmed in the making of these little guys! They hatched this way! Makes nuggets of all forms as well as people happier!

We have keychain and charm available.

Use on your keychain, as a backpack accessory, use it with your phone cases, as a stitch marker, or get one simply because there is nothing else so adorable!

100% made from high quality polymer clay! All our products are completely handmade so expect small variations! Yours is unique to only you.

All chicken nuggets are handmade, size/color will vary but you will always have a chicken nugget with a cute little face!
$5.93 ADD TO CART
) } export default ItemOverview;
